English
Set in the near future. Pharoah Mann, a right wing politician is elected into power.
He clears the streets of all people that are considered a blight on society, such as
petty criminals, alcoholics, tramps, drug addicts, asylum seekers and refugees and
puts them all into a ghetto where unless they have a work permit they cannot leave.
When Moses the son of Pharoah finds he is not actually the privileged son of a
politician but the son of a refugee who was put into the ghetto 20 years previously,
he begins a war with his father in order to free the people of the ghetto.
